Html:
here is the default code
<mui:LinkGroup x:Name="Pamakwas" DisplayName="Welcome" />

but every time I run it, the "W" is converted to lower case.

I am also interested to know this.

Feedback, anyone?

The default ModernMenu style uses a ToLowerConverter value converter to explicitly convert group display names to lowercase. Link display names are converted to uppercase using the ToUpperConverter.

If you want to change this behavior, you need to define and use a custom ModernMenu style having the converters removed. Steps:
  1. Copy the source of the default ModernMenu style (rename it for instance to MyModernMenu.xaml)
  2. Modify the xaml of MyModernMenu.xaml
  3. Add the MyModernMenu.xaml link to App.xaml. No need to assign a key to the new style, it automatically becomes the implicit style for your app.
